page.title: 20Meals,Eckington part2.
page.content: {Suppers:-}The most popular drink was milk, then drinking chocolate, then orange.Most, but not all, children had supper. Drinks were the favourite thing for supper. The favourite food was biscuits, then sandwiches, cakes and crisps. {Sunday midday meals:-}On our survey we found that the most popular meat was chicken. There wasn't a prefered first couse. he most popular vegetables were boiled or mashed potatoes, followed by cabbage and peas. A lot of people liked roast potatoes. Some children did not have a traditional Sunday lunch, they had quiche, spaghetti, cheese, fish fingers, sausage roll, boiled egg, bacon, tomato, sandwiches, salad and chips. The most popular drink was orange squash, then lemon, then tea. The most popular pudding was custard, then ice cream.
